title: Fourteen rats and a ratcatcher
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Francesco Tenze
brief_description: There is inevitable conflict between an old woman and a family of rats living under the same roof. A deal is struck when the old woman brings in a ratcatcher. Based on the book by James Cressy and Jamasin Cole.
creator_credit_for_label: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Francesco Tenze
